        Create a new ship.

        length - ship length (field units)
        name - a descriptive name
        image - image file with a picture of this ship

        public Field.Fieldelements shoot(int posX,

        Check if this ship is hit by a shot and update the ship status.
        Parameters:
        posX - shots X value
        posY - shots Y value
        Returns:
